body:
# Write

You can write your files using Markdown.

Check out this documentation as an example.

More to come.
rawBody:
## Write

You can write your files using
[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown).

Check out
[this documentation](https://github.com/MoOx/statinamic/tree/master/demo/content)
as an example.

_More to come._
raw:
---
title: How to use statinamic
---

## Write

You can write your files using
[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown).

Check out
[this documentation](https://github.com/MoOx/statinamic/tree/master/demo/content)
as an example.

_More to come._
